story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_0100_10: So far, it looks like a normal event.
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Thank you all for gathering here! I would like to
make a big announcement today!
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_0300_10:
In fact, this speech is being broadcast all
over Pasio.
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Based on the results of our research on
sync stones...
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_0500_10:
we are working on developing technologies that
can utilize their energy.
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_0600_10: Now, let me guess what you’re all thinking.
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_0700_10:
“Sync stones should only be used for
Pokémon battles.”
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Today—as proof of what I just shared—we shall
share some of our findings with everyone!
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1101_1000_20:
Rose presented a variety of his inventions to
the spectators...
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_1100_10:
(It shouldn’t be easy to access the research data
on sync stones!)
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_1200_10: (How did he get his hands on it?!)
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_1300_10: As you can see, sync stones...
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_1400_10:
have the potential to be an excellent source of
energy—to create a better future!
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Oh-ho! So there are still other ways to utilize
sync stones!
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_1600_10: Maybe he can help me with my inventions.
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_1800_10:
The wonderful value of sync stones has
been ignored...
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_1900_10:
and they have been downgraded to simple tools
used to promote Pasio!
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Prince Lear, the leader of Pasio, has been
controlling and monopolizing them!
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_2300_10: Sync stones can be used to enrich everyone’s lives!
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_2400_10: Why should we use them only for battling?
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Shouldn’t we be acting as quickly as we can,
to research how we can use them for energy?
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_2600_10:
To ensure we can thrive a millennium from now,
and even for an eternity...
story_galar_01_10000/2401_1001_2700_10:
I, Rose, would like to take over all sync stones’
management!
